constituent: pour, water, water droplets, water pistol, candlestick, lord, drop, king, jewel, ball
heisigStory: Picture pouring water from a lighted candlestick. What could be more ridiculous, or simpler, as a way to recall this kanji?
koohiiStory1: Visualize an idiot trying to figure out how to extinguish a candle. He sees a glass of WATER and decides to pour it onto the CANDLESTICK to put it out. Water spills everywhere.
koohiiStory2: Like water the hot wax poured down the side of the candlestick.
words:
注す(さす): pour or serve (drinks)
注文(ちゅうもん): order, request
注ぐ(そそぐ): pour (into), fill, irrigate, pay, feed (a fire)
注(ちゅう): annotation, explanatory note
注目(ちゅうもく): notice, attention, observation
注ぐ(つぐ): pour (in), fill (with)
注意(ちゅうい): advise, pay attention
注射(ちゅうしゃ): inject
